category.description: Code the charge category for this line item

unit_amount.description: Amount of a single unit of this line item

unit_amount_currency.description: 3 letter code of currency for this line item. If not provided, assumed to be USD.

delivery_date.description: requested delivery date for this tender (in YYYY-MM-DD format)

earliest_pickup_date.description: Earliest date tender is available for pickup (in YYYY-MM-DD format)

earliest_pickup_time.description: Earliest time tender is available for pickup (in HH:MM:SS format)

equipment_type.description: machine_readable string of the EquipmentType requested for this tender.

error_message.description: Open-ended field for error information regarding this tender

expires_at.description: Datetime that this tender expires at.

info_message.description: Open-ended field for other information regarding this tender e.g special instructions

lane_type.description: machine_readable string of the LaneType (formerly QuoteLaneType) requested for this tender.

latest_pickup_date.description: Latest date tender is available for pickup (in YYYY-MM-DD format)

latest_pickup_time.description: Latest time tender is available for pickup (in HH:MM:SS format)

reference_number.description: Reference number/string for this tender. Primarially for references from external systems.

transit_days.description: Number of days scheduled for transit

carrier.description: UUID of the carrier for the company the shipment is being tendered to

service_level.description: Id of the service level type

shipment.description: UUID of the shipment this tender is for

tender_to_company.description: UUID of the company to tender this shipment to
